title: New Look Cochin
content:
Who designed This New Look Cochin Font For Rolling Stone?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [103\_0075.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414174043/http:/typophile.com/files/103_0075.JPG) | 1013.95 KB |
author: dhannah1000

comments.content: Certainly we can find a better image than that.
It was designed by Blurry D. in the 80s.

This survival/revival was co-designed by Jim Parkinson and myself. What's shown so far is not yet complete, it'll probably be three or so issues before all of the glyphs and kerning and features are in use.

Cheers

I am all a blurr with anticipation :-)

ChrisL
Well thanks for the good infomation, dberlow. Can you give me an update when the full font is finished and when it's goning to be out? thanks
